types.name: ArraySchema
types.summary:
An Avro schema representing an array. Arrays contain a variable number of items of a single
            type.

types.name: ArraySchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ArrayResolution" />.

types.name: BooleanSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a boolean value.

types.name: BooleanSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.BooleanResolution" />.

types.name: BytesSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a variable-length sequence of bytes.

types.name: BytesSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.ByteArrayResolution" />.

types.name: ComplexSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a complex type.

types.name: DateLogicalType
types.summary:
A logical type representing a calendar date (with no reference to a
            particular time zone or time of day) as days from the Unix epoch.

types.name: DecimalLogicalType
types.summary: A logical type representing an arbitrary-precision signed decimal number.

types.name: DecimalSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DecimalResolution" />.

types.name: Declaration
types.summary: A common base for Avro schemas and related models (such as record fields).

types.name: DoubleSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a double-precision (64-bit) floating-point number.

types.name: DoubleSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.FloatingPointResolution" /> (double-precision).

types.name: DurationLogicalType
types.summary:
A logical type representing an amount of time defined by a number of months, days, and
            milliseconds.

types.name: DurationSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DurationResolution" />.

types.name: EnumSchema
types.summary:
An Avro schema representing a set of string constants (symbols). All
            symbols in an enum must be unique.

types.name: EnumSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.EnumResolution" />.

types.name: FixedSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a fixed number of bytes.

types.name: FloatSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a single-precision (32-bit) floating-point number.

types.name: FloatSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.FloatingPointResolution" /> (single-precision).

types.name: IntSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a 32-bit signed integer.

types.name: IntSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> (32-bit and smaller).

types.name: InvalidNameException
types.summary: An exception thrown when a name does not conform to the Avro naming rules.

types.name: InvalidSchemaException
types.summary: The exception that is thrown when a schema contraint is violated.

types.name: InvalidSymbolException
types.summary: An exception thrown when a symbol does not conform to the Avro naming rules.

types.name: ISchemaBuilder
types.summary: Builds Avro schemas for .NET types.

types.name: ISchemaBuilderCase
types.summary:
Builds Avro schemas for specific type resolutions. Used by <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilder" /> to
            break apart schema building logic.

types.name: LogicalType
types.summary: A custom Avro type that can decorate one or more built-in types.

types.name: LongSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a 64-bit signed integer.

types.name: LongSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> (larger than 32-bit).

types.name: MapSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a map of string keys to values.

types.name: MapSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.MapResolution" />.

types.name: MicrosecondTimeLogicalType
types.summary:
A logical type representing a time of day (with no reference to a particular time zone) as
            microseconds after midnight.

types.name: MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType
types.summary: A logical type representing an instant in time as microseconds from the Unix epoch.

types.name: MillisecondTimeLogicalType
types.summary:
A logical type representing a time of day (with no reference to a particular time zone) as
            milliseconds after midnight.

types.name: MillisecondTimestampLogicalType
types.summary: A logical type representing an instant in time as milliseconds from the Unix epoch.

types.name: NamedSchema
types.summary:
An Avro schema identified by a name and (optionally) aliases. The name and aliases may each
            be qualified by a namespace.

types.name: NullSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing an absent value.

types.name: PrimitiveSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a primitive type.

types.name: RecordField
types.summary: A field in an Avro record schema.

types.name: RecordSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a record (a data structure with a fixed number of fields).

types.name: RecordSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" />.

types.name: Schema
types.summary:
An Avro schema. Represented in JSON by a string (naming a defined type), an object with a
            "type" key, or an array (representing a union).

types.name: SchemaBuilder
types.summary: A schema builder configured with a reasonable set of default cases.

types.name: SchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A base <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.ISchemaBuilderCase" /> implementation.

types.name: StringSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a Unicode character sequence.

types.name: StringSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.StringResolution" />.

types.name: TemporalBehavior
types.summary: Options for building schemas for temporal types (timestamps, durations, etc.).

types.name: TimeLogicalType
types.summary: A logical type that represents a time of day.

types.name: TimestampLogicalType
types.summary: A logical type that represents an instant in time.

types.name: TimestampSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TimestampResolution" />.

types.name: UnionSchema
types.summary: An Avro schema representing a union of schemas.

types.name: UriSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.UriResolution" />.

types.name: UuidLogicalType
types.summary: A logical type representing a universally unique identifier as defined by RFC 4122.

types.name: UuidSchemaBuilderCase
types.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.UuidResolution" />.
